Full Description: At Health Vector, we organize health information and make it accessible using highest security and compliance standards to deliver timely and relevant experiences to all users. Avanti is an innovative SaaS global platform to develop digital health solutions for healthcare, pharmaceutical, biotech and medtech industries.  Our optimized, pre-built and compliant cloud-based SaaS platform can serve as the foundation for apps, analytics, medical devices, health companions and Software as a Medical Device (SaMD). Avanti replaces the need for lengthy and complex implementations “from scratch” by offering high quality configurable app components in a compliant platform build to meet global security, privacy and regulatory requirements. Our patented digital health technology unifies longitudinal health tracking, real world data, medical records exchange based on the FHIR/HL7 standard, blockchain technology with smart contracts, and intelligent data analytics for remote patient monitoring solutions. Built on AWS, the Avanti SaaS platform leverages micro-services to centralize digital solutions and aggregate data across products and therapies. The Avanti platform operates in multiple languages, is highly customizable and scalable. The Avanti SaaS platform enables companies to deliver high velocity innovation while maintaining compliance with privacy, security, quality and regulatory requirements. Operational excellence best practices optimize costs and accelerate time-to-market for digital health solutions. Health Vector was founded in 2018 and is headquartered in Newton, MA. Description: The AI-Enabled SaaS Platform that is Optimizing Democracy
Full Description: See our future-dated mock press release for the best understanding of Upvote. Voter-turnout at all-time-high as politicians partner with Upvote to better understand their electorate on an issue-by-issue basis. Des Moines, IA – November 5, 2024 Voter turnout among those aged 18 - 35 has reached an all-time high this election cycle, thanks largely to widespread politician partnerships with Upvote. Upvote’s verified information has taken the guesswork out of politics, freeing representatives to act in the best interest of their constituents. Since their inception, Upvote has informed and empowered voters nationwide to instigate change within their political jurisdictions by providing a trusted connection between representatives and their constituents, culminating in a renewed sense of faith in American Institutions. “Before I started using Upvote, I had completely given up on politics,” Shared Nathan P. “I felt like most politicians had a hidden agenda - that they overlooked their constituents in favor of special interests. Now I want to participate because we’re seeing that change is possible.” Upvote transforms the way voters connect with their elected officials by providing a platform that groups, verifies, educates, and empowers them. Their curated, unbiased news feed keeps voters informed and up-to-date on their top policy interests and representatives. Politician ratings give a clear picture of how officials represent important issues. Issue tracking brings plain-language to complex policy and its impact on individuals and their communities. Representative profiles make it easy to understand motivations through campaign finance contributions by special interest, personal investments, voting history by issue, and unbiased bios. Most importantly, verification provides a direct line of communication between voters and their representatives, giving weight to the voice of verified constituents. “I never felt like I actually knew who these politicians were or how their actions matched their words.” shared John H. “I would try to research, but the information was so hard to find and to understand. Now I just check Upvote. Not only do I understand what’s going on, I can see how I’m influencing these outcomes in real-time. It’s addictive.” Beyond serving constituents, Upvote provides a critical service for politicians and their back-office staff. Through their constituent verification mechanism, Upvote has re-architected the public forum to cut through the inherent noise of traditional social media platforms. Officials now know that they’re communicating with real, verified voters in their jurisdiction. They are given a platform to explain their actions and beliefs directly to those that they represent. They are also equipped with granular, proprietary data regarding verified constituent sentiment across all key policy areas. This deep, informed connection allows them to better serve their constituents, and has allowed them to build a reputation through effective service instead of fundraising. “My top priority has always been to effectively serve my constituents, but there was no way for me to stay deeply connected with them at scale.” shared Congressman Brad T. “Aside from town halls and door knocking, it was difficult for me to gather the data-points I needed to serve them on every issue. Now, I check Upvote before every vote on the house floor. My constituents even help me draft language in the bills I bring to subcommittees. The best part is that I’ve gotten so much recognition for my service through Upvote that I don’t need to fundraise nearly as much. I can just focus on serving my community.” Through their platform, Upvote has proven that it is possible to disrupt traditional lobbying and campaign finance, placing democracy’s outcomes back in the hands of the voter.
Headquarters Regions: Midwestern US

Description: Our AI-powered Pseudo-LiDAR technology transforms any Monocular camera into an advanced object monitoring system
Full Description: We have developed a solution that allows us to transform any ordinary camera into a pseudo-LiDAR system. This technology allows us to capture 3D data from the environment using a standard 2D camera, providing many of the same benefits as a LiDAR system at a fraction of the cost. Our patented technology enables detailed highway traffic analysis in 3D, which can improve road planning and allow for real-time traffic management. Our pseudo-LiDAR technology is versatile and can be used in a wide range of applications, including traffic management, real-time monitoring, and parking occupancy monitoring. With this technology, we are able to provide our clients with access to powerful 3D sensing capabilities, enabling them to unlock new possibilities and drive innovation.

Description: Transforming mental healthcare for parents.
Full Description: Fifty-one percent of mothers report feeling depressed and 42% report crying due to overwhelm at least a few times a week. Between 2008 and 2018 there was a 30% increase in parent-reported stress, while today 62% of parents find at least some aspects of parenting “extremely stressful.” We're in the midst of a parent mental health crisis. Modern parenting is H-A-R-D, and we’re here for it. Yes Collective is transforming mental healthcare for parents with the first-of-its-kind digital mental wellness platform that solves the interconnected problems of modern family life through coach-led guidance, step-by-step practice, and community support. Our collective is an expert team of doctors, therapists, psychologists, and behavioral health coaches who translate cutting-edge science and expert wisdom on all facets of parent mental health & wellness into actionable, simple, and effective tools for self-healing and multi-generational wellbeing. We combine parent-focused expert knowledge and practice into a mobile ecosystem of AI-assisted emotional fitness coaching, live therapist-led events, daily articles and recordings from the experts, and a private, facilitated social network just for parents. Yes Collective is stepping up to transform mental and emotional healthcare for all parents by making expert therapeutic tools, practices, and one-on-one support accessible, bringing expert care right into their back pockets. We’re helping families become happier and healthier, one parent at a time.

Description: BCAST, a social video platform with an emphasis on what we call “invite video”.
Full Description: BCAST, a social video platform with an emphasis on what we call “invite video”. What does that mean? With BCAST, using a text you can quickly initiate a request to friends, family or colleagues, -we call it a BOUNCE- inviting them to create a video with you providing the subject. The text directs them to click a link, which instantly enables their device to easily create a video that is returned or “bounced back” to the requester and stored in their account. The video creator controls the process and can use multiple takes to get the video just right before returning. If the video is engaging enough, with one click text approval by the creator, the video can be added to the BCAST social video Wall and shared with other social media sites such as Facebook, TikTok, youtube or Instagram. There is also an option to upload videos directly to BCAST wall without using Bounce.

Full Description: Conception is a company developing the technology to turn skin cells into viable human eggs. This technology will give women the opportunity to have children well into their forties and fifties, eliminate barriers for couples suffering from infertility, and potentially allow male-male couples to have biological children. Long term, this technology could be a critical platform allowing for widespread genetic screening of embryos. If proven safe, it could even enable for genetic editing to eliminate and reduce the risk of devastating diseases for future generations – such as Alzheimer’s, heart disease and many different types of cancers. Leerink Capital provided seed capital to Fund I (approximately 3% of capital commitments) and operational support. In January 2019, SVB Financial Group (“SVB”), the holding company of Silicon Valley Bank, a U.S.-based high-tech commercial bank, acquired the Leerink businesses including Leerink Capital.  Todd Cozzens, Jared Kesselheim, MD, and SVB expect to agree to a mutually beneficial ongoing relationship in which Transformation Capital (as an independent management company owned by Todd Cozzens, Jared Kesselheim, MD, and Michael Dixon and not affiliated with SVB or Leerink Capital) shall manage Fund II and whereby Transformation Capital shall manage Fund I’s investment portfolio pursuant to a sub-advisory agreement with SVB (or an affiliate).  Transformation Capital has the same operational leader, Kevin Brown, formerly CFO of Leerink Capital, and Transformation Capital expects to continue to derive benefits from its ongoing relationship with Leerink and SVB.

Description: Bestmap is an aggregator of all mobility and transportation providers in one app.
Full Description: Bestmap is an aggregator of all transportation incl e-scooters, bikes, metro, busses, trains, rental cars, mopeds, flights, and more in one app. Bestmap envisions a time when, for the first time, urbanists and travelers will be able to use one app to find all mobility companies on the map that operate in the city, book tickets for the bus, train, airplane, self-driving cars, and have cool features, all on the same itinerary. We use a win-win strategy when mobility partners-clients and the department of transportation in different cities share data, and users can use data from that company via the Bestmap app. Bestmap also provides an analytics platform for mobility providers and transportation authorities. Businesses and Transportation authorities want to know when, where, and why people use their transport (bikes, busses, airplanes...), they want to know where people fly or drive, transportation authorities want to improve the local transportation system. All of them spend billions of dollars on improving the transportation system, getting more users, and growing the company.  Instead of asking local people, buy tickets at the station, use different maps to find routes, find bus routes, electric chargers, gas station prices or find parking in the city, users can contribute and edit it in the app.  We are looking forward to collaborating with companies, transportation authorities and allow people to know how to get from point A to B faster, cheaper, safer anywhere in the world!

Description: Allegiant H2O's goal is to connect investors worldwide with water projects, creating a global network for water-related investments.
Full Description: Allegiant H2O aims to create a global network that connects investors with water projects while bridging the gap between the technology required for such projects and financing solutions. By doing so, Allegiant H2O is working to accelerate the development of much-needed water-related projects worldwide. The company recognizes that water is a finite resource, and that many communities around the world face water scarcity and inadequate infrastructure. To address these challenges, Allegiant H2O provides investors with access to a range of water projects that require funding and connects them with the necessary technology to ensure the success of these projects. Moreover, Allegiant H2O understands that financing is a critical component of any water project, and that many worthy projects may not receive the necessary funding. Therefore, the company is working to bridge the gap between investors and water projects, creating a platform that enables easy and efficient investment in water-related initiatives.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Houston Area, Southern US

We operate web & mobile app platforms to help families across the country find caregivers for in-home care services, with the dual goals of improving affordability and quality of care. Description: AI that ensures AI is fair & trustworthy! AI trust & transparency software to detect & remove bias & discrimination from customer models.
Full Description: SolasAI is software that detects and removes bias & discrimination from a customer's decisioning models. It works in credit & insurance underwriting, predictive marketing, healthcare, and employment to name a few use cases. We use AI to fix AI. We provide trust & transparency into artificial intelligence, machine learning, and standard statistical models. We have over 45 years experience doing this, so our software is designed by the people that large banks, insurers, and healthcare providers trust to help them identify and lower their risk.  If you are tired of paying expensive experts who can't seem to agree, and then leave the hard part of fixing the problems to your expensive and over worked data scientists, then SolasAI is for you.  We follow the latest decisions and signals from courts, regulators, and law makers, as well as the latest and greatest technology trends for AI and fairness as a whole. This is built into SolasAI so you don't have to figure it out yourself. SolasAI is also flexible enough to adjust to your business without exposing you to unnecessary risks. We help you identify the fairest and best performing alternatives, and then create just the right amount of data and justification for you to communicate with auditors, regulators, or other stakeholders. We believe in fairness, but we are practical problem solvers. Bad decisions are bad decisions. We help you make the best decisions while expanding your business and uncovering new possibilities through fairness. Modelers, are you tired of tools trying to replace you or call your 'babies ugly?' Well SolasAI is your co-pilot to help take your great data science and insights and ensure you also achieve amazing fairness. We solve this together using cool data science. We are your partner and not your competition!

Description: Using digital marketing to empower small and medium size businesses
Full Description: Markets all over the world are increasingly consolidated. Major corporations continue to merge, and small businesses are struggling. We offer services intended to make small and medium size businesses competitive once again. We do that by offering services that are simple and intuitive, making it accessible to all business owners, independent of their level of technical competence. Our doneWebs service provides small and medium size businesses, as well as private contractors and freelancers, with a fully customized website, built for them by professionals with the assistance of automation and machine learning. Business owners can get their own fully customized website built for them in as little as 24 hours, with a subscription at the price of a phone line.  Running a business and making it competitive is more difficult than ever. That’s why we’re planning to launch services that will continue to improve the lives of business owners by offering intuitive platforms that simplifies business management. Our focus in everything we do is to get things done. We aspire to bring simplicity to everything business, and everything else. Going forward, that means simplifying every part of the marketing creative process, including logos, social media, graphic design, data analytics, research, advertising, networking, and much more.   We envision a done. that will revolutionize and disrupt much more than the website design and development industry, but that will also disrupt the entire digital marketing industry and beyond.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: ClearGrowth has merged technology with finance to help business owners grow their business and achieve the American dream.
Full Description: ClearGrowth has merged financial services and technology to make it accessible for small business owners. Using software and business expertise, we help entrepreneurs and business owners achieve the American dream. Setting the business up for success is what we are passionate about. All businesses are unique in their own way, but ClearGrowth can understand your specific needs and what it takes to achieve growth and financial clarity. While in business, we've found business owners who have various issues such as time management, lack of a business overview, misunderstanding of finances, not having enough funds, not having the correct KPIs, and simply not understanding what it takes to grow the business! We offer a painkiller to all of these problems and will understand your needs. Small businesses in America are the backbone of the economy and are often burdened with competing with large corporations. Along with the normal hardships that come with running a business, small business owners also face fierce competition. We stand with small businesses across America and help them compete with bigger corporations and enable them to grow their business! Visit our site and learn more! If you're interested, please contact us and we'll hold a one on one meeting on how we can help elevate your business to the next stage of growth.

Description: Intuaition is an AI-assisted NLP social analytics tool that extracts, analyzes and interprets social data.
Full Description: Intaution Technologies also known as Qaptum, is a Social Listening Platform uses NLP (Natural Language Processing)  in true Machine Learning AI technology to intelligently capture desired content, extract Key Words and Phrases, categorize, understand the intent of language, analyze sentiments, and deploy dynamic dashboards and reports, all with extremely high accuracy and in real-time.  NATIVE LANGUAGES Most Social Listening tools analyze Sentiment under grammatical and semantic rules associated with the English language. However, Spanish, and other Romance languages ​​use countless contextual elements, making the interpretation of an expression above its literal meaning very challenging. In addition, elements such as sarcasm, ambivalence, double meaning, or implicit mischief are not easily classified by a tool whose operational and internal structure was designed to analyze English content.  Qaptum breaks this barrier, using AI and NLP, associated with regionalized libraries such as Mexican, Argentinian, or Spanglish, makes Qaptum an ideal tool for analyzing content specific to a country or region with a high level of precision. SENTIMENT VS. EMOTIONAL ANALYSIS Sentiment Analysis provides data points limited to reflect only Positive, Negative, and Neutral feelings in a conversation. In contrast, Emotional Analysis examines these sentiments in further detail and interprets them into specific behaviors.  For example, a Negative Sentiment can further be categorized into sad, angry, or skeptical, while a Positive Sentiment can be happy, optimistic, or enthusiastic.  Qaptum’s Emotions Engine, “available in Maximum and other advanced products,” offers an incomparable new dimension in understanding and interpreting the conversation around you. EASE OF USE, INTUITIVENESS Qaptum’s products are conceived and designed from inception to offer a superior user experience, granting a flawless, frictionless, easy to learn, and pleasant use of the product to enable full empowerment to use the system accurately, quickly through an efficient process.  EXTREMELY COMPETITIVE TOTAL COST OF OWNERSHIP (TCO) Qaptum offers much more functionality and capacity for a much lesser cost. In addition, our straightforward pricing models give much-needed transparency, predictability, and flexibility vs. comparable products in the market. Besides, due to its superior ease of use capabilities, On-Boarding and product training represent just a tiny fraction of the system’s overall cost, and self-sufficiency is achieved from the very first week of purchase.  SUPERIOR ANALYTICS With millions of data points generated every second, the ability to discover, interpret and communicate precise quantitative and qualitative data to find the signal from the noise is the most critical and vital deliverable of Qaptum’s solution. Our real-time dashboards and reports are always available on-demand, let alone the ability to download the data to do your analytics.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Data and Analytics, Sales and Marketing, Software

Description: Smart Energy for people off-the-grid.
Full Description: We DEVELOP IoT HARDWARE PRODUCTS to provide POWER, ENERGY STORAGE, DATA and CONNECTIVITY SOURCES. Our products are SMART, SUSTAINABLE, and COMPACT CONCEPTIONS. We like to say that we build the best chargers ever made. Our list of solutions include: SOLAR7: The most compact and efficient Solar Charger ever built. FROST SUMMITS: The world’s first Smart IoT Solar Chargers and Power Banks BOX CONNECT app: Track energy performance, recommended travel plans and share. SER project: Modular concept to provide Essential Services fast and safe. BEAS: Sustainable access points of Water, Energy and Health Data for Smart Cities We apply the use of renewable resources targeting clients interested in environmental care, but providing an efficient product that can be used wherever and whenever. Our innovation in design and applying the best technology allows us to reduce size and weight in products, keys to carry resources to places where other products do not work, reaching the best user experience. People want and need power wherever they go.  Outdoor adventurers, travellers, military sector, humanitarian assistants or beneficiaries in areas of resilience, all have in common that they spend days away from home. During this period they seek to stay connected, safe and healthy, although to achieve this these people will require energy to charge their technological devices from anywhere when they are off-grid or outside the service network. Any of these people are surrounded by needs that include electronic devices, such as using a GPS, communicating on a smartphone, or turning on a lamp. So why is access to energy so important? The answer is simple, because when energy is not accessed, people's health and safety is at risk. That is why from Box Synergy we serve these people during these situations. We aim to be a world leader in innovation, design and technology, but with social, economic and enviromental impact. Everytime, and everywhere we have the same goal: #LetNothingStopsYou
Headquarters Regions: East Coast, Southern US

Description: CanBe Innovations: Empowering cancer patients with AI-driven community support via our mobile app, and charities with cost-effective CRM.
Full Description: At CanBe Innovations, we pledge to revolutionize the cancer journey by championing empowerment, support, and connection. Our dual-platform approach intertwines cutting-edge AI technology with compassionate care, providing cancer patients with immediate, no-cost access to a vetted network of charitable resources via our mobile app, and offering charities an innovative, cost-effective CRM solution through our web app. The CanBeApp.com platform operates with a commitment to integrity and trust, employing GuideStar verification to ensure the legitimacy of each charity. Once onboard, organizations can claim their account and engage with clients directly, streamlining their operations and enhancing their outreach. Our mission is twofold: to enrich the cancer care experience for patients, attend to their emotional journey with sensitivity, and empower charities with the tools they need to manage relationships and maximize their impact efficiently. Together, we’re not just innovating—we’re transforming the landscape of cancer support and charity interaction.

Description: Revolutionizing transportation with innovative software solutions. Streamline operations, optimize efficiency, and drive growth.
Full Description: Welcome to DirectX, where we are revolutionizing transportation management through innovative solutions and cutting-edge technology. Established in 2021 during the challenging times of the COVID-19 pandemic, we embraced the power of technology to overcome obstacles and create a virtual transportation company that defied industry norms. At DirectX, we harness the latest advancements in fintech and technology to provide a comprehensive range of virtual transportation services. Our key differentiator is our Blockchain Transportation Management Services, offering secure and efficient logistics solutions to businesses. As a Certified Self-Insured Trucking Company, we deliver reliable and cost-effective transportation services. Our platform, powered by web and mobile applications, provides clients with easy access to our Accounting, Brokerage, Dispatch, and Vehicle Management Services, streamlining their operations and maximizing efficiency. With our Account Management and Marketing Services, our clients receive exceptional support and service tailored to their needs. Furthermore, our members gain exclusive access to HomeBox* Parking and Business Centers, offering a convenient and reliable transportation solution. Having achieved impressive gross revenues of over $2.5 million within a short timeframe during successful beta-testing, our focus is now on enhancing our online virtual services to provide clients with an on-demand app-based platform. This platform will revolutionize transportation management by enabling clients to access our services with just a few taps on their smartphones, making their transportation needs more convenient than ever before. Real-time shipment tracking, personalized dashboards, integration with popular accounting software, automated dispatching, and robust security measures will empower our clients with efficient and secure operations. As a startup company, we offer comprehensive transportation services with a unique advantage that sets us apart from the competition. Our expertise in blockchain-based transportation management ensures secure and efficient logistics solutions for businesses. With our certification as a self-insured trucking company, we guarantee reliable and cost-effective transportation services. Our accounting, brokerage, dispatch, and vehicle management services streamline operations and maximize efficiency. Through our account management and marketing services, we are dedicated to delivering the best possible service to our clients. As a member of our services, you will gain exclusive access to our HomeBox* Parking and Business Centers. With ambitious plans to expand our online virtual services into an on-demand app-based platform, we are poised to revolutionize the transportation industry. Join us on this exciting journey as we redefine transportation management with our state-of-the-art solutions. Contact us today to learn more about our services and discover how DirectX can transform your transportation operations.
Headquarters Regions: Dallas/Fort Worth Metroplex, Southern US
Industry Groups: Apps, Financial Services, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Software, Transportation

Description: We built an oral disease screening platform using AI and imaging to allow any medical professional to catch oral diseases earlier.
Full Description: At Vitrix Health, we created a more accessible oral health screening solution. We use optics paired with machine learning on a mobile platform to enable medical primary care providers (PCP) to screen for oral diseases more effectively. Given the link between oral and systemic health, this improves outcomes and costs for the 108M Americans that don’t see a dentist but do see a doctor every year and other high-risk groups.[1] Our technology reduces disparities in oral health by empowering the PCP to detect disease and intelligently refer the right patients to a dentist. Our device is pilot testing in Mt. Sinai Hospital in New York, Carle Clinic in Illinois, and University Of Chicago Medical School in Illinois. We also have 2 international clinical trials with the Rotary Foundation in Bolivia and Manipal College of Dentistry in India.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US

Operating under the name of Esportz Network, the company is the Number 1 esports news agency in the world with over 85 professional freelance reporters, photographers and Videographers active on our news and entertainment platform. Content is delivered through a proprietary EsportzNetwork.com web-based platform along with Reuters as the Global partner for esports, news, photos, video, and podcasting.  Key Features of Esportz Network Platform: •	Itemized news and information of major esports games: teams, matches, & player pages •	Integration with Reuters Connect, Reuters Global distribution for over 3,000 news outlets •	Esportz Network virtual tournaments which can be fully branded for sponsor participation. •	An entire operating system for hiring, incentivizing and managing freelance reporters, photographers, and videographers for approvals, story processing, and payments. •	Mobile Responsive - display for all devices and screen sizes – Mobile app in process •	Designed from the ground up for multiple languages •	Freemium model for both the casual and dedicated gamers •	24/7/365 Streaming to a global audience across multiple games •	Leading Podcasting and integration with traditional media for esports reporting EsportzNetwork.com also features a Cosplay section with a rapidly growing number of cosplayers from around the world. Esportz Entertainment Corp. holds a California Talent Agency license to provide representation for Cosplayers and Influencers.  In November 2019, the company launched www.esportsIMG.com as a dedicated stock esports photo subscription site serving advertising agencies, social media managers, website builders, and other content creators looking for a fresh supply of professional esports photography. In 2020, the site will add hundreds of esports photos and esports videos.  The EsportzNetwork website works with global esports and mobile gaming companies along with national advertisers to offer ad placement on the esportznetwork.com website which currently receives over 1.5 Million views per week.

Description: Infisign is an IAM platform that helps implement Privileged access management (PAM), SSO, and Passwordless using Zero trust methodologies.
Full Description: Infisign is an Identity and access management platform that helps implement Privileged access management (PAM), Single Sign-on, and Passwordless using Zero trust methodologies. In today's enterprise environment, the increased use of multiple SaaS and cloud services has created a significant problem, as secure and cost-effective solutions are lacking. Infisign allows your organization to sync the user information from multiple application directories and curate it into a single user repository without duplicating it across ecosystems. Further, using infisign you can now provision, de-provision, and manage user roles across all your applications.  By implementing our solution, enterprises have the potential to reduce authentication costs by approximately 60%. Infisign tackles the vulnerabilities associated with traditional password-based systems by introducing a seamless and highly secure passwordless authentication approach. Leveraging cutting-edge technology, including advanced encryption algorithms and zero-trust methodologies, Infisign delivers a robust and user-friendly security solution.   You can watch our product video at https://youtu.be/gcAEEgfA7js to learn more about our product.

Description: The mobile game that teaches children with neurodivergence positive habits and life skills.
Full Description: Motivate your kids to do chores & learn good habits, using a kid-friendly game that teaches valuable life skills through a blend of real-life and digital activities. In Joon, you assign “Quests” to your kids. When your kids complete their quests, they get coins and experience points that they can use to grow, customize, and care for their virtual companions (Doters). Quests can be anything from chores and exercising to learning and completing homework assignments -- the tasks are endless. You can help your children build good habits and discipline by making quests recurring. You can assign and easily track allowances to quests too, turning your standard chore chart into a fun, engaging game that is great for the whole family. By creating a game around real-life chores and tasks, Joon encourages kids to complete these tasks. This saves parents from nagging and repeatedly asking their kids to do important things like chores, studying, and exercising. Better yet, Joon turns kids into self-starters where they will proactively start doing these types of tasks on their own without parents even having to assign any to them.

Description: Vizulingo is an EdTech mobile app that upskills English learners with Virtual Reality, Artificial Intelligence, and gamification.
Full Description: Vizulingo is a B2B EdTech/HealthTech mobile app that uses immersive technology to upskill adult English learners. Amidst the current influx of immigration, Vizulingo is positioned to harness this transformative period as an opportunity to educate non-native English speakers with specialized English language training tailored for the healthcare sector. Our initiative is particularly focused on addressing the acute job gap in one of the most in-demand roles in the U.S. – the Home Healthcare Aide. By equipping immigrants with the necessary language skills, we aim to empower them to seamlessly integrate into the healthcare workforce, filling critical positions and contributing to the well-being of our aging population. Our mission at Vizulingo transcends language learning; it's about creating pathways for success and inclusion within the healthcare industry for those looking to make a new life in a new country. We believe in leveraging innovative learning technologies to break down barriers, foster understanding, and prepare individuals for meaningful careers in home healthcare. Through our specialized curriculum and immersive learning methods, we're dedicated to enriching the lives of immigrants and refugees, while simultaneously addressing the growing demand for qualified healthcare aides. Key Highlights of Our Offering: - Dedicated Focus: Tailored English language training for the healthcare sector, aiding immigrants in filling the job gap for Home Healthcare Aides. - B2B Model: Providing licenses to home healthcare agencies to upskill their workforce with crucial language competencies. - Competitive Pricing: Flexible license pricing between $8,000 and $25,000, designed to accommodate various agency sizes and budgets. - Innovative Technology: Utilizing VR and AI to deliver engaging, effective, and personalized language education. - Meaningful Impact: Aiming to enhance communication, increase caregiver confidence, and improve patient care standards. At Vizulingo, we're not just teaching language; we're building bridges to better futures, empowering immigrants and refugees to achieve their career aspirations in the home healthcare domain, and strengthening the healthcare system with the skilled workforce it urgently needs.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Education, Science and Engineering, Software

Description: WeCare is a U.S. & European based medical technology startup operating in Africa.
Full Description: WeCare is a U.S. & European based medical technology startup operating in Africa. Our mission is to democratize healthcare by delivering quality, affordable, and accessible healthcare to the masses. We presently operate 4 clinics in Sub-Saharan Africa with plans to expand into other markets in Africa and Europe. We’ve served over 1.2 million customers to date, including 425 babies delivered and thousands of vaccines administered. We are pointedly working to become the leading provider of healthcare and medical technology services in greater Africa within 3 years. We provide quality, affordable, and accessible care to huge populations that are currently underserved. Our offerings exceed that of the competition in a variety of ways: 1. We maintain low prices in order to reach the most customers possible and maintain the fierce brand loyalty and reputation we’ve earned. 2. Our growth strategy aims to provide all Sub-Saharan Africans access to a clinic in under two hours, and our templated clinic model ensures that customers know what to expect regardless of which location they visit. While other singley owned clinics are a gamble, our service is ubiquitous and reliable. 3. Our specialized clinics offer services not currently available in many locations, such as maternity care or emergency care. 4. Our on-demand services provide care for those unable to reach a clinic, as well as affluent customers who demand specialized attention. These will be expanded to reach more mainstream customers over time. 5. Our technological solutions, including universal medical records, patient analytics, and predictive AI elevate the standard of care to a new level. These features enable us to treat our patients proactively, while the rest of the industry still operates under a reactive model. In addition to these points, our work builds the foundation for a thriving social infrastructure. We bring with us a sizeable need for skilled labor and education. Our presence is already driving significant traffic to the areas where we operate, resulting in local industries flourishing around our clinics. We foresee our work elevating communities, countries, and Africa as a whole by breaking down barriers of health-insecurity and fostering the growth of infrastructures that will unite Africa with the rest of the world.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Information Technology, Science and Engineering

Build diverse team: Say goodbye to unconscious bias. Give all applicants an equal, unbiased opportunity to showcase their talent. Designed for high completion rate: Our tests are low-stress, adaptive, and take just 30 mins to complete. This is why over 80% of applicants complete the test, which is 2-3x better than typical assessments. Testlify is the most candidate friendly assessment tool Test on-the-job skills: Test candidates for on-the-job skills over trick questions and find the most qualified candidates. Try our library of questions that are designed to test for fit rather than memorization of algorithms. Create a role-specific assessment to test your applicants. Native ATS Integrations: We integrate with popular recruiting tools such as Greenhouse, Lever, GoodTime, and many more so you can spend less time switching tabs  Testlify’s unique AI-powered assessment technology is a proven solution against high employee turnover rates. Get rid of the manual tasks in your hiring process and automate laborious processes from ‘Apply’ to ‘Hire’. Travelers and companies can subscribe to Jet-Set Offset and choose to support a nonprofit organization automatically with a one cent-per-mile donation every time they, or their employees, fly. Description: X-Centric Sciences company provides instrumentation systems for soil carbon analysis.
Full Description: The quantification of soil organic content is currently achieved by wet oxidation, loss on ignition or dry combustion methods which are time consuming, destructive, expensive and/or produce environmentally harmful byproducts. Spectroscopy system such as visible near infrared and mid infrared have been used to predict soil carbon but these instruments can be expensive, require hyperspecialized calibrations, and conduct only superficial measurements. X-Centric is researching and developing pXRF instrumentation systems for soils allowing streamlined acquisition of vertically stratified geochemical, carbon, and density information through the soil profile.

Description: We are developing a brand-new technology, that is going to disrupt the markets of Connected Cars, HUDs and HMI.
Full Description: VisualARise, an international technology-centric startup, is developing a brand-new technology - "4D imaging holographic AR Head-up display". Basically, it's a next-generation head-up display technology that is going to disrupt the markets of Connected Cars, Head-up displays (HUDs) and Human-Machine Interface (HMI). Without expensive sensors (LiDARs etc.) using our proprietary True holographic AR technology, we make every car become autonomous-ready, maximize driving safety and bring the ultimate experience of driving in new world of holographic AR. We bring a cure of distracted driving to every car/truck. Leveraging the power of AI and cutting-edge technologies, we change the paradigms of how we (humans) interact with machine and environment, how we drive vehicles (cars, trucks etc.). With VisualARise technology, we make come true one of the biggest trends of Connected Cars market of next decade - replacing traditional car instrument clusters and dashboards with next-generation Head-up displays and sensors.
